00033 #ifndef MSQ_ELEM_SAMPLE_QM_HPP
00034 #define MSQ_ELEM_SAMPLE_QM_HPP
00035 
00036 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00037 #include "QualityMetric.hpp"
00038 #include "Sample.hpp"
00039 
00040 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00041 
00050 class ElemSampleQM : public QualityMetric
00051 {
00052 public:
00053   
00054   MESQUITE_EXPORT virtual ~ElemSampleQM();
00055   
00056   MESQUITE_EXPORT virtual MetricType get_metric_type() const
00057     { return ELEMENT_BASED; }
00058   
00067   MESQUITE_EXPORT virtual 
00068   void get_element_evaluations( PatchData& pd, size_t elem_index,
00069                                 std::vector<size_t>& handles,
00070                                 MsqError& err ) = 0;
00071 
00077 #ifndef _MSC_VER
00078   enum {
00080     ELEM_INDEX_BITS = sizeof(size_t)*8 - Sample::NUMBER_PACKED_BITS,
00082     MAX_ELEM_PER_PATCH = ((size_t)1)<<ELEM_INDEX_BITS,
00084     ELEM_SAMPLE_MASK = MAX_ELEM_PER_PATCH - 1
00085   };
00086 #else /* MS Visual C compiler broken for 64-bit enums */
00087   static const size_t ELEM_INDEX_BITS = sizeof(size_t)*8 - Sample::NUMBER_PACKED_BITS;
00088   static const size_t MAX_ELEM_PER_PATCH = ((size_t)1)<<ELEM_INDEX_BITS;
00089   static const size_t ELEM_SAMPLE_MASK = MAX_ELEM_PER_PATCH - 1;
00090 #endif
00091   
00092   inline static size_t handle( Sample sample, size_t index )
00093     { return (sample.pack() << ELEM_INDEX_BITS) | index; }
00094   
00095   inline static Sample sample( size_t handle ) 
00096     { return Sample(handle >> ELEM_INDEX_BITS); }
00097   
00098   inline static size_t elem( size_t handle ) 
00099     { return handle & ELEM_SAMPLE_MASK; }
00100 };
00101 
00102 } // namespace Mesquite

00104 #endif
